summary: This is a calendar entry for a scheduled meeting titled 'Epstein Press Meeting' between Jeffrey Epstein and U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman on July 1, 2019. The entry indicates the meeting was accepted and scheduled to take place in the 8th Floor Library.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Listed as the attendee for a scheduled 'Epstein Press Meeting' with Jeffrey Epstein on July 1, 2019.

events.title: Epstein Press Meeting
events.description: A scheduled meeting between Jeffrey Epstein and U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman, categorized as 'X-PERSONAL' and set to occur in the 8th Floor Library.

keyFacts: A meeting titled 'Epstein Press Meeting' was scheduled between Jeffrey Epstein and U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman for July 1, 2019.
The meeting was marked as 'Accepted' and classified as 'X-PERSONAL' on the calendar.
The meeting was set to take place in the '8th Floor Library'.
The calendar entry was created on June 28, 2019, shortly before the scheduled meeting.
